description:
At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of..

AOL and AOL Integration, AOL Terminology, About System Administration, System vs. Database Administrator.

Also going to learn about the basics of Value Sets, Defining Values and Value Sets, Basics of Flexfields, Planning and Defining Key Flexfields, Defining Segments, Planning and Defining Descriptive Flexfields, Descriptive Flexfield Segments Window, Context Field Values.

You are going to learn about the basics for Report Registration, Concurrent Executable, Request Groups Window, Submitting a Request.

Basics of Form Registration, How Function Security Works, Developers Register Functions. Developers Create Menus, The TEMPLATE Form, Special Triggers in the TEMPLATE form.
title: Oracle EBS R12 - AOL & System Administrator for Developers
